com.amalgam.app

类 ApplicationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amalgam.app.ApplicationUtils

  • public final class ApplicationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for Application.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static android.app.Application getApplication(android.content.Context context)
      获取Application实例 Get the Application of the Context.
      static boolean isDebuggable(android.app.Application app)
      Checks if the application is running as debug mode or not.
      static boolean isDebuggable(android.content.Context context)
      判断当前应用是否调试模式 但是当我们没在AndroidManifest.xml中设置其debug属性时: 使用Eclipse运行这种方式打包时其debug属性为true,使用Eclipse导出这种方式打包时其debug属性为法false.
      static boolean isInstalledOnSDCard(android.app.Application app)
      Checks if the application is installed on external storage, in most case on the SD card.
      static boolean isInstalledOnSDCard(android.content.Context context)
      判断应用是否安装在外部sd卡上 Checks if the application is installed on external storage, in most case on the SD card.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getApplication

        public static android.app.Application getApplication(android.content.Context context)
        获取Application实例 Get the Application of the Context.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        返回:
        the Application.

      • isDebuggable

        public static boolean isDebuggable(android.content.Context context)
        判断当前应用是否调试模式 但是当我们没在AndroidManifest.xml中设置其debug属性时: 使用Eclipse运行这种方式打包时其debug属性为true,使用Eclipse导出这种方式打包时其debug属性为法false. 在使用ant打包时，其值就取决于ant的打包参数是release还是debug. 因此在AndroidMainifest.xml中最好不设置android:debuggable属性置，而是由打包方式来决定其值. 有些时候我们想在给公司的测试机上安装的release版本也输出日志，那么这个时候我们到 AndroidManifest.xml 中的application 标签中添加属性强制设置debugable即可，如下： application android:debuggable="true" tools:ignore="HardcodedDebugMode" Checks if the Application is debuggable or not.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        返回:
        true if debuggable, false otherwise.

      • isDebuggable

        public static boolean isDebuggable(android.app.Application app)
        Checks if the application is running as debug mode or not.
        参数:
        app - the application to check
        返回:
        true if debuggable, false otherwise.

      • isInstalledOnSDCard

        public static boolean isInstalledOnSDCard(android.content.Context context)
        判断应用是否安装在外部sd卡上 Checks if the application is installed on external storage, in most case on the SD card.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        返回:
        true if the application is installed on external storage, false otherwise.

      • isInstalledOnSDCard

        public static boolean isInstalledOnSDCard(android.app.Application app)
        Checks if the application is installed on external storage, in most case on the SD card.
        参数:
        app - the application to check.
        返回:
        true if the application is installed on external storage, false otherwise.
